Изначально был хороший отзыв, меняю обзор в третий раз (второй был так же плохой). Я хоть и играю изредка, но у меня своя доля мазохизма и только  за выживших сейчас. Баланс по заработку наград за игру кривейший, маньяки тут просто аниматоры немощные стали, которые делают 4 кила только на очень слабых игроках (пати уничтожает все шансы ману почти в ноль), желания играть за них сейчас нет. Мне не хватает обучения на каждом новом маньяке в коллекции с ботами. Буду дальше мейнить сурвов и наблюдать за агонией бедной второй стороны.

A Wildly fun game that practically perfectly replicates the vibes of a good horror film
Playing as a survivor is an anxiety filled experience, the closest to the feeling of being hunted without becoming the victim of a felony.
Each killer feels almost like a unique game in and of themself and while some have a huge learning curve, you can't go wrong with just picking the one you like the aesthetic of the most.
Lots of good familiar characters, but also some GREAT original ones as well. All that's needed are more cryptids and aliens and the horror genre cast will feel truly all encompassing

I do enjoy this game. The community can be pretty toxic at times, but I do enjoy trying to out think the killers, or get stomped by survivors.

Dead By Daylight

Advantages:
+ You can build your character up through tasks

Disadvantages:
- The new patches decrease the duration of survivor perks and increases the duration of killer perks makes the game more unbalanced.
- You will lose most of your equipment that you set through the round with a random long wait to get that certain equipment back the wait can lead discomfort
- Random unknown rankings playing with and against it could lead you a disadvantage that you are not comfortable having
- Random maps you might have to play a map that is against your skills that you are not comfortable with having
- Certain tasks you can't complete without purchasing certain characters or killers that randomly shows up as one or two of the three daily tasks that you can do to help speed up blood points.
- On Wednesday December 8 2021 after Disconnecting from link behavior My 385000 blood points and 1400 shard reset to 0.
- On Wednesday December 8 2021 when linking my steam account to epic games account using link behavior my auric cells did not transfer at 11:32PM ET.
- On Wednesday December 8 2021 when disconnecting my epic games and steam account it reset the progress plus 10% more progress before I linked the accounts were lost. It had problems reverting back the progress on my accounts.
- On Friday January 8 2022 I started having problems with using created shortcuts made by this game through steam.
- Match making is random and very unfair especially if a a player selects a killer that makes your selected challenge very uneasy to complete. You cannot see the killer before you select your challenge.

This game is fun and I really enjoy it.  One of the biggest downsides though is the end game chat.  Usually its all GG's until that one salty player gets mad you didn't give them hatch or something stupid like that.  But over all I highly suggest this game, especially to new computer users.

I have no idea why this game is popular or has very positive for review status..its terrible beyond belief. Very clunky and repetitive...also just boring. You just repair generators. There is no scare factor at all...being chased is more annoying and frustrating than it should be. The maps are just as terrible as gears 5 too. They try and use themes to keep the game interesting and change the vibe(resident evil for example) but its still a clunky boring mess with a *insert popular theme* blanket draped over.... Got it on sale and still refunded the game...the boring clunky tutorial should have been a red flag...play the tutorial and thats pretty much what youll be doing on repeat..nothing new to experience. Save yourself the hassle...DONT BUY!

Best 4v1 horror survivor games of all times.

Very fun game, some toxic players but that is to expect with most online games, especially competitive games. People complain a lot about face camping, slugging, etc. (Definitions on Google and Reddit) There are only so many options. Yes getting completely slugged or face camped can be annoying, adapting is apart of the game and so is frustration, though the killer only has so many choices of what to do with injured, dying, and hooked survivors. The toxic teams of trolls can come along and ruin games, but once again, that is to expect in an online multiplayer game, and so are sweats who don't know how to calm down. On the flip side, there are funny and nice trolls who t-bag, farm bp, and are nice and sweet. The problems many face do occur and are important to note, though letting that portion ruin the game is your fault. If you don't like it or do not find it fair, consider taking a break or finding a lfg/team to help. Maybe watch videos on how to counter play, or relax. On balancing issues and glitches/game errors, I believe the dev team does work hard on fresh, new content and has nerfed and buffed some needed perks and add-ons, though some have been, as many say, lost in the storm. For example, DS was broken for awhile and then fixed much later on, still being very strong and honestly annoying, though I think it is a fair addition to the game because of the inability to completely steamroll with it over and over and can only be used once per trial. The once per trial leads to eliminating a perk slot and taking away a possibly helpful perk that could be used like Spine Chill, Dark Sense, etc. The trade off allows for one escape, then an empty perk slot, and if used correctly, can be insane or not of use. The same aspect of very useful or not at all is adrenaline. To be in a spot when the perk would be popped is a blessing, otherwise, it can take away a potential perk as mentioned above, for two more examples, Dead Hard or Sprint Burst, two great perks. In conclusion, the game is very fun but can be a glass half full game. Depending on who you are as a player and person, like all games, will be a ton of fun or another game for you to hate on, for good reason or not. There are negative attributes to the game, though I believe it is a fantastic game that can allow fun in solo, group, and killing a bunch of players with your favorite horror movie characters and using unique perks and abilities. 
Rating: 8.5/10 
HIGHLY RECOMMEND
